attributes.action: If MPs quit political party’s then an automatic by-election should be triggered
attributes.additional_details:
Recently several Labour MPs have quit the Labour Party to become Independent Members of parliament without having to call a by-election to ask voters what they think 

That is undemocratic 

Whether i vote for a Labour candidate Conservative or Liberal Democrat i expect that if they are elected they should stay loyal . If they are unable to remain within that political party than an automatic by-election should be held ASAP so voters get to choose between the incumbent or a new MP
attributes.background:
It is undemocratic that an Mp can quit the  political party they represented at the last general election without having to call a by-election 

A by-election should be immediately called so voters have the choice to choose the incumbent  mp Or pick a new one representing the party they quit
